definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: feel, grope (NH id. Pi.; Ar. mas=a feel; Eth. marsasa: Di:l66; Aram. ma4, [[מְשַׁשׁ]] Pa., Palp.—v. also [[ימשׁ]], II. [[מושׁ]]);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. sf. [[יְמֻשֵּׁנִי]] Ge 27:12 perhaps my father will feel me; [[וַיְמֻשֵּׁהוּ]] v:Ge 27:22 and he felt of him (both J).

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 2 ms. [[מִשַּׁשְׁתָּ]]; Impf. 3 ms. [[יְמַשֵּׁשׁ]] De 28:29, [[וַיְמַשֵּׁשׁ]] Ge 31:34; 3 mpl. [[יִמַשְׁשׁוּ]] Job 5:4, Job 12:25; Pt. [[מְמַשֵּׁשׁ]] De 28:29; —feel over or through, grope:—

[[לָבָּן אֶת־כָּל־הָאׂהֶל]] ´[[וַיְמ]] Ge 31:24 and Laban felt through the whole tent (i.e. searched it); so (obj. [[כֵּלַי]]) v:Ge 31:37 thou hast felt through all my possessions (or baggage; both E).
grope, of blind De 28:29 b (in simile), periphr. conj., [[וְהָיִיתָ]] [[מְמַשֵּׁשׁ]]v:De 28:29 a and thou shalt become one that gropes at noonday (fig. of judicial blindness); cf. Job 5:14, Job 12:25.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[וְיׇמֵשׁ חשֶׁח]] Ex 10:21 that one may feel (the) darkness; rd. also Imv. sf. [[הֲמִשֵׁנִי]] (for [[והימשׁני]], v. [[ימשׁ]], p. 413 supr.) Ju Jdg 16:26 and let me touch the pillars (2 acc.)
